content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction area at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)
- Assembling machine (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, the Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Check the furnace's inventory after ensuring it has items to inspect. If the inventory is empty, it will show no items.
